verses.verse: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man עֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> 'a-Mod stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lei-cha, upon thy feet וַאֲדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> va-'a-dab-Ber and I will speak אֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tach.

וַתָּ֧בֹא <S%H935><s%> vat-Ta-vo entered בִ֣י vi ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, And the spirit כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber into me when he spake אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about וַתַּעֲמִדֵ֖נִי <S%H5975><s%> vat-ta-'a-mi-De-ni unto me and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lai; me upon my feet וָאֶשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> va-'esh-Ma' that I heard אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> mid-dab-Ber him that spake אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about פ Peh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שׁוֹלֵ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> sho-Le-ach I send אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֽוֹתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei thee to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nation הַמּוֹרְדִ֖ים <S%H4775><s%> ham-mor-Dim to a rebellious אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מָרְדוּ־ <S%H4775><s%> ma-re-du- that hath rebelled בִ֑י <S%H99999><s%> Vi; הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they וַאֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-Tam against me they and their fathers פָּ֣שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> Pa-she-'u have transgressed בִ֔י <S%H99999><s%> Vi, עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against עֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> 'E-tzem against me [even] unto this very הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

וְהַבָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> ve-hab-ba-Nim, children קְשֵׁ֤י <S%H7186><s%> ke-Shei churlish פָנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim accept וְחִזְקֵי־ <S%H2389><s%> ve-chiz-kei- harder לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, care for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am שׁוֹלֵ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> sho-Le-ach I do send אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; and וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta thee unto them and thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD

וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah them אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- whether יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U And they whether they will hear וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- or יֶחְדָּ֔לוּ <S%H2308><s%> yech-Da-lu, or whether they will forbear כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> me-Ri (for they [are] a rebellious הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah; like וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-Ya-de-'U, acknowledge כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> na-Vi that there hath been a prophet הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah has been בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Cham. among פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- And thou son אָ֠דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom of man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- neither תִּירָ֨א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra be not afraid מֵהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem like וּמִדִּבְרֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1697><s%> u-mid-div-rei-Hem of their words אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תִּירָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra, of them neither be afraid כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki though סָרָבִ֤ים <S%H5621><s%> sa-ra-Vim though briers וְסַלּוֹנִים֙ <S%H5544><s%> ve-sal-lo-Nim and thorns אוֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> o-Tach, for וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- on עַקְרַבִּ֖ים <S%H6137><s%> 'ak-rab-Bim among scorpions אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah and you יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev; [be] with thee and thou dost dwell מִדִּבְרֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H1697><s%> mid-div-rei-Hem of their words אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- neither תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra be not afraid וּמִפְּנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> u-mip-pe-nei-Hem at their looks אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תֵּחָ֔ת <S%H2865><s%> te-Chat, nor be dismayed כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki though בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> me-Ri though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. you

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ta And thou shalt speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai my words אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- whether יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U unto them whether they will hear וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- or יֶחְדָּ֑לוּ <S%H2308><s%> yech-Da-lu; or whether they will forbear כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> me-Ri for they [are] most rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah now you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- But thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man שְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' hear אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- to what אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> me-dab-Ber what I say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> te-hi- unto thee Be not מֶ֖רִי <S%H4805><s%> Me-ri thou rebellious כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> ke-Veit house הַמֶּ֑רִי <S%H4805><s%> ham-Me-ri; like that rebellious פְּצֵ֣ה <S%H6475><s%> pe-Tzeh open פִ֔יךָ <S%H6310><s%> Fi-cha, thy mouth וֶאֱכֹ֕ל <S%H398><s%> ve-'e-Chol and eat אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten that I give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. then

וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh And when I looked וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold יָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> yad behold an hand שְׁלוּחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> she-lu-Chah [was] sent אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- lo ב֖וֹ vo מְגִלַּת־ <S%H4039><s%> me-gil-lat- unto me and lo a roll סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer. of a book

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> vai-yif-Ros And he spread אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai, it before וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi it was כְתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> che-tu-Vah me and it [was] written פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nim within וְאָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> ve-'a-Chor; and without וְכָת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> ve-cha-Tuv and [there was] written אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha, on קִנִ֥ים <S%H7015><s%> ki-Nim therein lamentations וָהֶ֖גֶה <S%H1899><s%> va-He-geh and mourning וָהִֽי׃ <S%H1958><s%> va-Hi. and woe ס sa-Mek
